mapper.select:
select t.id id, -- t.tin_sn tinSn, -- 红锡膏SN t.scrap_time scrapTime, -- 报废时间 t.scrap_name scrapName, -- 报废人 t.scrap_reason scrapReason, -- 报废原因 t.item_code itemCode, -- 料号 t.supplier_code supplierCode, -- 供应商代码 t.receive_time receiveTime, -- 入库时间 t.receive_doc_no receiveDocNo, -- 入库单据号 t.receive_name receiveName, -- 入库人 t.expire_time expireTime, -- 过期时间 t.area_sn areaSn, -- 区域SN t.create_time createTime, -- 创建时间:按当前时间自动创建 t.update_time updateTime -- 更新时间 from tin_scrap t where 1=1
and t.tin_sn LIKE '%${p.tinSn}%'
and t.scrap_time LIKE '%${p.scrapTime}%'
and t.scrap_name LIKE '%${p.scrapName}%'
and t.scrap_reason LIKE '%${p.scrapReason}%'
and t.item_code LIKE '%${p.itemCode}%'
and t.supplier_code LIKE '%${p.supplierCode}%'
and t.receive_time LIKE '%${p.receiveTime}%'
and t.receive_doc_no LIKE '%${p.receiveDocNo}%'
and t.receive_name LIKE '%${p.receiveName}%'
and t.expire_time LIKE '%${p.expireTime}%'
and t.area_sn LIKE '%${p.areaSn}%'
and t.create_time >= '${p.startTime}'
and '${p.endTime}' >= t.create_time
order by t.id desc
